entry.title: Thursday: Mainly sunny. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud this afternoon. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this afternoon. High minus 1. Wind chill near minus 8. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Low minus 6 with temperature rising to minus 1 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning after midnight. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 overnight. Low minus 6 with temperature rising to minus 1 by morning. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Rain. High 10.
entry.summary: Snow changing to periods of ice pellets in the morning then to rain later in the morning. Risk of freezing rain in the morning. Rainfall amount 2 mm. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming southwest 20 gusting to 40 early in the afternoon. High 10. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Thursday 09 February 2023
